body_html: You will need to modify the code to accept an additional color argument (as a string), prepare a nvtxEventAttributes_t struct (using ctypes) based on the message and color, and change the C calls so that they use the functions with an Ex suffix (instead of A that we use right now). I'd to start by going through ctypes documentation
body_text: You will need to modify the code to accept an additional color argument (as a string), prepare a nvtxEventAttributes_t struct (using ctypes) based on the message and color, and change the C calls so that they use the functions with an Ex suffix (instead of A that we use right now). I'd to start by going through ctypes documentation
body: You will need to modify the code to accept an additional `color` argument (as a string), prepare a `nvtxEventAttributes_t` struct (using ctypes) based on the message and color, and change the C calls so that they use the functions with an `Ex` suffix (instead of `A` that we use right now). I'd to start by going through `ctypes` documentation
